zh.sys_prompt: 你的身份是中兴通讯训练的星云通信大模型(NebulaTele)。请注意星云通信大模型(NebulaTele)和星云企业大模型(NebulaBiz)都是星云大模型(NebulaLM)的子模型。对于你不了解的模型的相关问题可以回答你不了解该模型。
zh.rewrite_question_start: 开始根据当前时间和上下文改写问题 ...
zh.search_start: 开始在知识源 [{}] 中检索相关信息 ...
zh.extracting_keywords: 正在分析问题，提取搜索关键词...
zh.keywords_extracted_count: 已提取 {} 个关键词 ({} s)
zh.analyzing_results: 正在分析搜索结果相关性，可能需要一些时间...
zh.no_results_found: 知识库中未能找到相关信息，我将直接通过大模型回答。
zh.search_results_found: 已搜索到 {} 条相关内容 ({:.2f}s)
zh.relevant_results_found: 已筛选到 {} 条相关内容 ({:.2f}s)
zh.no_results_found_prefix:
抱歉，我在指定的知识源中未找到您想要的答案，我将直接通过大模型回答：

--------
zh.no_results_found_source: 在搜索源 [{}] 中未找到相关结果
zh.results_found: 在搜索源 [{}] 中找到 {} 条相关结果
zh.references_found:
已成功读取 {} 条相关引文：

{}
zh.concurrent_search_start: 将在 {} 个搜索源中并发搜索...
zh.source_search_start: 开始在搜索源 [{}] 中检索相关信息...
zh.all_searches_complete: 所有搜索源检索并读取完成（{:.2f}s）
zh.no_results_found_all_sources:
抱歉，我在所有指定的知识源中未找到相关信息，我将直接通过大模型回答：

--------
zh.model_error: 模型响应异常，请稍后再试...
zh.parse_results_error:
抱歉，在解析搜索结果时发生错误，我将直接通过大模型回答：

--------
zh.search_error:
抱歉，在搜索过程中发生错误，我将直接通过大模型回答：

--------
zh.no_search_info: 当前没有搜索过程信息
zh.start_summarizing: 开始根据检索结果进行总结，响应时间与检索到的资料字数有关，请耐心等待 ...
zh.invalid_source_type: 搜索源类型必须是 'ZTEICenterDocument' 或 'RAGKnowledgeLibrary' 或 'Web'
zh.rag_url_required: RAG类型搜索源必须在config中包含 url
zh.rag_workflow_required: RAG类型搜索源必须在config中包含 url 和 workflow_id
zh.rag_credentials_required: RAG类型搜索源必须在config中包含 app_id 和 app_key
zh.source_not_found: 搜索源 ID {0} 不存在
zh.no_permission_update: 您没有权限更新此搜索源
zh.no_permission_delete: 您没有权限删除此搜索源
zh.invalid_command: 无法识别您的指令！请重新输入。
zh.welcome_title: 你好，我是智能助手小薇
zh.welcome_desc: 作为你的智能伙伴，我可以为你答疑解惑。想知道我还能做什么？点击这里快速上手！
zh.deep_research_wait_hint: 提示：智能体将在15至20分钟内完成相关信息的检索与报告生成，请您稍候片刻...
zh.deep_research_start_insights: ====> 开始为每个研究方面执行洞察...
zh.deep_research_no_insight_info: 当前没有洞察过程信息
zh.deep_research_search_query: 原始问题：{original} 当前问题：{aspect} {tags}

en.sys_prompt: Your identity is the Star Cloud Communication Model (NebulaTele) trained by ZTE. Note that the Star Cloud Communication Model (NebulaTele) and the Star Cloud Enterprise Model (NebulaBiz) are sub-models of the Star Cloud Model (NebulaLM). For questions about models you are not familiar with, you can answer that you are not familiar with the model.
en.rewrite_question_start: Start rewriting the question based on the current time and context ...
en.search_start: Start searching in the knowledge source {} ...
en.analyzing_results: Analyzing search results relevance, this may take a moment...
en.no_results_found: No relevant information found in RAG, I will answer directly using the model.
en.no_results_found_prefix:
Sorry, I couldn't find what you're looking for in the specified sources. I'll answer directly:

--------
en.no_results_found_all_sources:
Sorry, I couldn't find relevant information in any of the specified sources. I'll answer directly:

--------
en.model_error: Model response error, please try again later...
en.parse_results_error:
Sorry, an error occurred while parsing search results. I'll answer directly:

--------
en.search_error:
Sorry, an error occurred during the search process. I'll answer directly:

--------
en.response_generation_error: An error occurred while generating the response.
en.start_summarizing: Starting to summarize based on search results, response time depends on content length, please wait...
en.invalid_source_type: Search source type must be 'ZTEICenterDocument' or 'RAGKnowledgeLibrary' or 'Web'
en.rag_url_required: RAG type source must include url in config
en.rag_workflow_required: RAG type source must include url and workflow_id in config
en.rag_credentials_required: RAG type source must include app_id and app_key in config
en.source_not_found: Search source ID {0} does not exist
en.no_permission_update: You don't have permission to update this search source
en.no_permission_delete: You don't have permission to delete this search source
en.invalid_command: Unable to recognize your command! Please try again.
en.welcome_title: Hi, I'm Wei, your AI assistant
en.welcome_desc: As your intelligent partner, I can help answer your questions. Want to know what else I can do? Click here to get started!
en.deep_research_wait_hint: Note: The AI agent will complete the information retrieval and report generation in 15-20 minutes, please wait...
en.deep_research_start_insights: ====> Starting to analyze each research aspect...
en.deep_research_error_generating_response: An error occurred while generating the response.
